MAN.TITLE: show_arcs

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : row vector of arc numbers (directed graph) or edge numbers (undirected graph)

DESCRIPTION.P: show_arcs highlights the set of arcs p of the displayed graph in the current window. If the optional argument sup is equal to the string "sup", the highlighting is superposed on the previous one.

This function can also be called to unhighlight highlighted arcs by using the call show_arcs([]). Note also that when a set of arcs is highlighted, the automatic highlight during mouse move is not performed. Calling show_arcs([]) restores the automatic highlight during mouse move.
